oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Shop and Save Grocery, 715 Overton Street, c.1950s-1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the Shope and Save Grocery, located at 715 Overton Street. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority, not dated. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
